Package List

Here are the packages with brief descriptions (if available):
advectionModule orchestrating the advection scheme. The main routine in the module is advection()
boundary_advection_moduleBoundary advection interface to be fulfilled by driver or application
boundary_diffusionBoundary diffusive flux interface to be fulfilled by driver or application
boundary_diffusion_matrix_moduleBoundary diffusive matrix interface to be fulfilled by driver or application
diffusionModule orchestrating the diffusion scheme. The main routine in the module is diffuse(). Explicit and implicit diffusion operators are included here
error_handlingRoutines containing error metrics for assessing convergence or accuracy
error_metricRoutines containing error metrics for assessing convergence or accuracy
example_initial_conditionsInitial conditions for examples It can fill an array with 1D Gaussin function, rectangular, and triangular, and also it can fill discontinuities. In case of multi-constituents tehy have to initialize separately
gradientModule containing routines for calculating differences and limiters
grid_refinementRoutines for grid refinement/coarsening operations
hydro_dataHydrodynamics interface to be fulfilled by driver or application
log_convergenceLog results of a convergence test
loggingRoutines containing error metrics for assessing convergence or accuracy
matrix_solverMatrix solver module for the system of linear equations. The solvers include:
  • Tri-diagonal solver using todo:? algorithm
  • Penta-diagonal solver using todo:? algorithm
  • Sparse matrix solver
primitive_variable_conversionModule containing routines for converting mass to concentraion, and concentration to mass
reactionModule orchestrating the reaction scheme. The main routine in the module is react()
source_sinkSource interface to be fulfilled by driver or application Specifically, the user must set the "source" pointer (a variable in this module) to a subroutine that meets the compute_source interface
state_variablesDefines state variables for the transport problem as well as functions to allocate them
stm_precisionDefinition of model precision, precision-related constants and special values
stm_typeDefinition of model types
test_a_d_r_neumannTest advection diffusion and reaction in a single channel with uniform flow, subjected to neumann boundary condition
test_advect_diffuse_reactTest advection diffusion and reaction in a single channel with uniform flow subjected to the Neumann flux = zero boundary condition
test_advection_tidalTesting advection of mass which is subjected to a tidal boundary
test_boundary_diffusionTodo: write tests for boundary diffusive flux subroutine Tests boundary diffusive flux pointer
test_coarseningTests the coarsening subroutine
test_construct_r_h_sTodo: write tests for construct right hand side subroutine before imposing Boundary Conditions Tests the interior elemets of right hand side F (KU=F)
test_diffusion_convergence_boundariesTodo: write tests for diffusion subroutine in case of Neumann BC at the left and Dirichlet BC at the right side

Test of transport diffusion convergence test for a single channel

test_diffusion_convergence_boundaries_dirichletTodo: write tests for diffusion subroutine in case of Neumann BC at the left and Dirichlet BC at the right side

Test of transport diffusion convergence test for a single channel

test_diffusion_normsTest of convergence of error norms in diffusion subroutine
test_diffusion_single_channelTest of transport diffusion convergence test for a single channel
test_diffusive_fluxWrite tests for interior diffusive flux sobroutine
test_explicit_diffusion_operatorTests for explicit diffusion operator subroutine
test_extrapolateTesting of the extrapolate step
test_gradientTest module for gradients and limiters
test_interior_coef_matrixWrite tests for interior lines of diffusion coefficient matrix
test_linear_decay_const_flowTest of decay of mass convergence in uniform flow
test_linear_decay_no_flowTest of mass transport convergence no flow
test_liner_reactionTest of mass transport convergence in uniform flow
test_matrix_solverTests for matrix solver
test_prim_cons_conversionTesting of primitive-conservative conversion
test_prim_increment_to_consTest for subroutine primitive increment to conservative
test_single_channel_advectionTest advection in a single channel for a flow regime that goes back and forth and ends up in the same spot periodically
test_transport_driverMain program unit for testing teransport
test_uniform_flowTest of mass transport convergence in uniform flow
